https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gkzkuUrSUbiEzK2XaB73gGfoqSF.jpg In a global pandemic, chronically ill Beth is forced to confront her personal demons in quarantine. When she answers a call from a mysterious man, an unlikely romance opens a lush, new cosmic world through astral projection. Borrelia Borealis
